attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To award Robert Zimmerman (Bob Dylan) an honour in either the Queens birthday list or the new years list for his fine use of the English language in songs over the last 40 plus years.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
